paper.title: A new transference theorem in the geometry of numbers and new bounds for Ajtai's connection factor

author.org: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, State University of New York, Bell Hall, Buffalo, NY#TAB#

paper.abstract: We prove a new transference theorem in the geometry of numbers, giving optimal bounds relating the successive minima of a lattice with the minimal length of generating vectors of its dual. It generalizes the transference theorem due to Banaszczyk. We also prove a stronger bound for the special class of lattices possessing ne-unique shortest lattice vectors. The theorem imply consequent improvement of the Ajtai connection factors in the connection of average-case to worst-case complexity of the shortest lattice vector problem. Our proofs are non-constructive, based on discrete Fourier transform.
